data.name: EllipticForest
data.description: A Direct Solver for Elliptic Partial Differential Equations on a Forest of Quadtree Meshes

evidence: "A Quadtree-Adaptive implementation of the Hierarchical Poincar√©-Steklov (HPS) method for solving elliptic partial differential equations."

"Solve elliptic PDEs on an adaptive mesh" and example main() program showing direct use of EllipticForest classes to solve PDEs, indicating it is an end-user solver application rather than just a library component.

Build and install instructions are via CMake and make from the repository (e.g., `cmake -S . -B build ...`, `make`, `make install`) with no mention of package managers or binary releases, implying distribution primarily from the source repo.
